_class_ llama\_index.storage.docstore.KVDocumentStore(_kvstore: BaseKVStore_, _namespace: Optional\[str\] \= None_)[](#llama_index.storage.docstore.KVDocumentStore "Permalink to this definition")

Document (Node) store.

NOTE: at the moment, this store is primarily used to store Node objects. Each node will be assigned an ID.

The same docstore can be reused across index structures. This allows you to reuse the same storage for multiple index structures; otherwise, each index would create a docstore under the hood.

This will use the same docstore for multiple index structures.

Parameters

*   **kvstore** (_BaseKVStore_) – key-value store
    
*   **namespace** (_str_) – namespace for the docstore
    

add\_documents(_nodes: Sequence\[[BaseNode](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/api_reference/node.html#llama_index.schema.BaseNode "llama_index.schema.BaseNode")\]_, _allow\_update: bool \= True_) → None[](#llama_index.storage.docstore.KVDocumentStore.add_documents "Permalink to this definition")
